Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah! Hey, <MYNAME>! Great timing!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
See, I helped out this guy earlier, and he gave
me a bunch of food in thanks. I decided to cook
it all up and, well...I got carried away.
<PAGE>
I made way more than I could ever eat myself,
so I was just thinking of calling someone over to
share in the feast.
<PAGE>
So, are you feelin' hungry?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah! That's the answer I was hopin' for! It'd be a
shame to let any of this go to waste.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's dig in! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Mmm-mm! That was great! ♪ It's been ages
since I really let loose with my appetite. Yum!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What'd you think, <MYNAME>?
You'll make a great husband!
Wow, you're actually pretty good.
You had this delivered, right?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh! You bet I will! ♪
<PAGE>
I think real men today need to know how to
cook, clean and take care of their household!
What gal wouldn't want me as their man?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Wait...are you sayin' YOU want me to be your
hubby?!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Well, uh...I-I'm really flattered, but shouldn't we,
y'know, date and stuff first...?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Arrrgh! You were just TEASING me, weren't you?
You shouldn't joke around about stuff like that. I
actually thought about it for a sec!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? What is it?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Where's my kitchen...? W-well...uh...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Ummmmmmmmm....

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Arrgh! Okay, okay! I can't afford to buy one, so I
don't have one!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I bugged Raeger until he let me cook up
everything over in his restaurant's kitchen.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You wouldn't believe how many trips it took to
carry it all back here...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Just thinking about it is making me tired...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I really did cook it all myself, y'know! I just
borrowed Raeger's kitchen. He didn't make a
thing!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh! Glad you liked it! C'mon, enough
compliments. You're makin' me blush!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Anyway, thanks for stopping by and sharing
lunch with me, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You should come by again sometime, so I can
show off my awesome cooking skills for ya. I
just know you'll love it! ♪

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
See ya later!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
H-hey! What's with the hearty helping of doubt?
I know I might not look it, but I can handle
household chores with the best of 'em!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway, I'd better get this all cleaned up and get
back to work.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thanks for stopping by and having lunch with
me, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
See ya later!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh! Believe it or not, it's from--
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>HEY! I said right off the bat that I made too
much! I cooked this food! Me!
